attributes.action: Stop the postponement of local elections in 2025
attributes.additional_details: The local elections are a democratic way for the people to voice who they wish to be running their local councils. By delaying these elections many millions of people will be denied their democratic right, to change local councils who at the moment, they may not be happy with.
attributes.background: Stop the postponement of local elections in 2025.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
